actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to support college students to meet satisfactory academic progress.
short_title: Satisfactory Academic Progress Reset and Reform Act

summary.text:
Satisfactory Academic Progress Reset and Reform Act

This bill revises satisfactory academic progress requirements for federal student-aid programs, including by allowing a student who has not been enrolled in an institution of higher education for two years to regain eligibility for federal student aid.

titles.title: Satisfactory Academic Progress Reset and Reform Act
Satisfactory Academic Progress Reset and Reform Act
A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to support college students to meet satisfactory academic progress.
